actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the Sunday following Fire Service Recognition Day as "Memorial Sunday" for firefighters who have been disabled or killed in the line of duty during the preceding year.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to annually designate the Sunday following Fire Service Recognition Day as "Memorial Sunday" for firefighters disabled or killed in the line of duty during the preceding year.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the Sunday following Fire Service Recognition Day as "Memorial Sunday" for firefighters who have been disabled or killed in the line of duty during the preceding year.
